TopicTitle: I think my love for KSP infiltrated our survival Minecraft server

Articles.Content:
So I also play Minecraft A LOT and on the survival server me and my friends play on we like to build cool things on our spawn. My recent love for KSP and other space flight gave me an idea. I present to you Space Shuttle Voxel:

The main hull, wings and tail fin of the orbiter are made of Nether quartz blocks, so are the SRB's. The heat shielding is made of blocks of Coal and the main fuel tank is made of Orange stained clay.

Meanwhile, in my save...

In all seriousness, that is insanely awesome!
My friends always complain that I can't build **** so I'm pretty proud of Voxel.

Bit ironic how the shield is made of something highly flammable.

I'm also fairly impressed with your landscaping.

Bit ironic how the shield is made of something highly flammable.

I'm also fairly impressed with your landscaping.

The first thing I wanted to make the heat shield out of was black wool but I had more coal and it looks better actually.

The landscaping is mostly generated or done by my friends.

Edited February 11, 2014 by viccie211
